function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sending a questionnaire to a large population may result in a low response rate, affecting the representativeness of the sample.","Impact":"Invalid or biased results, leading to inaccurate conclusions and ineffective interventions.","Mitigation":"Use multiple communication channels and incentives to encourage participation, and consider the representativeness of the sample in the analysis.","Technologies":"Survey management systems with reminder features and tracking mechanisms.","People":"Respondents, researchers, decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Using a Likert scale to measure agreement may result in subjective interpretation and response bias.","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement of respondents' attitudes and perceptions.","Mitigation":"Ensure clear and specific wording of scale points, provide training to respondents on scale interpretation, and use complementary qualitative methods for validation.","Technologies":"Online survey platforms with customizable scale options and validation checks.","People":"Respondents, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, survey administrators"},{"Description":"Inaccurate statistical analysis and interpretation of results may lead to faulty conclusions and recommendations for disease containment measures.","Impact":"Deployment of ineffective or misaligned interventions, compromising public health outcomes.","Mitigation":"Validation of statistical assumptions, peer review of analysis, and transparency in reporting methods and findings.","Technologies":"Statistical software with built-in validation tools and peer collaboration features.","People":"Researchers, decision-makers","Owner":"Researchers, data analysts"}]}
